description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested to 25 CFSD Montreal by September 2023.
full_summary:
### Tente Contract

#### Tender Information
| Description | Value |
| --- | --- |
| **Title** | Tent (Tente) |
| **Reference Number** | cb-7860-95011877 |
| **Amendment Number** | 5 |
| **Solicitation Number** | W8485-247749/A |
| **Publication Date** | 2023-08-03 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | 2023-09-27 14:00:00 |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | 2023-10-31 |
| **Expected Contract End Date** | 2023-12-31 |

#### Solicitation Details
| Description | Value |
| --- | --- |
| **Trade Agreements** | *Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), ... |
| **Procurement Category** | *Goods and Services (GD) |
| **Procurement Method** | *Competitive - Open Bidding |
| **Notice Type** | *Request for Proposal (Demande de Proposels) |
| **Solicitation Description** | The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the delivery of 10 tents (GSIN: 8340, NSN: 8340-21-903-1088) to 25 CFSD Montreal by September 2023. |

#### Contracting Entity
* **Name** | National Defence (Défense Nationale)
* **Address** | 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

#### Contact Information
* **Name** | Debbie Bergeron
* **Email** | debbie.bergeron@forces.gc.ca

#### Tender Description
The Department of National Defence invites bidders to submit a proposal for the delivery of tents. The delivery is requested to 25 CFSD Montreal by September 2023. Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name and model and/or part number and the NCAGE they are offering.

### Related Documents
To access the solicitation documents, please visit:
* [English Version] https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7860/w8485-247749-a-amd-001-%28en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7860/w8485-247749.a---bid-solic
